Details.name: Rolen
Details.Portrait: file://C:\Program Files (x86)\Wizards of the Coast\Character Builder\SamplePortraits\RacePortKenku.png

statadd.conditional: against a creature you are flanking instead of the normal +2 bonus, and you grant a +3 bonus to attack rolls or skill checks when aiding another instead of the normal +2 bonus

statadd.String: Electric Action:When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you deal lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier to one, two, or three creatures of your choice within 5 squares of you.

RulesElement.name: Flock Effect
RulesElement.specific: Gain +3 against flanked creature instead of +2, and grant +3 to attack rolls and checks with aid action instead of +2.

RulesElement.name: Mimicry
RulesElement.specific: Mimic sounds and voices with a successful Insight check (opposed by Bluff).

RulesElement.name: Spell Source
RulesElement.specific: Each sorcerer has a Spell Source

RulesElement.name: Storm Power
RulesElement.specific: Add Dexterity modifier to damage, +2 at 11th, +4 at 21st

RulesElement.name: Storm Soul
RulesElement.specific: Resist thunder and lightning and pierce thunder and lightning with your spells. End your resistance to gain +4 to all defenses

RulesElement.name: Storm's Embrace
RulesElement.specific: On a 20 push 1 and fly 1+ your Dexterity modifier.

RulesElement.name: Versatile Expertise
RulesElement.specific: Bonus to attacks with weapons and implements of your choice

RulesElement.name: Versatile Expertise (Light Blade)
RulesElement.specific: +1 to attack rolls with Light Blades.

RulesElement.name: Dual Implement Spellcaster
RulesElement.specific: Add off-hand implement enhancement to damage rolls

RulesElement.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
RulesElement.specific: +1 damage while holding a melee weapon in each hand

RulesElement.name: Unarmored Agility
RulesElement.specific: +2 AC while wearing cloth armor or no armor

RulesElement.name: Weapon Focus (Staff)
RulesElement.specific: Gain +1 damage per tier with Staffs.

RulesElement.name: Resounding Thunder
RulesElement.specific: Add 1 to size of blast or burst with thunder keyword

RulesElement.name: Electric Action
RulesElement.specific: When you take an action point action, deal Dex mod lightning damage to 1, 2, or 3 creatures within 5.

RulesElement.name: Unstoppable Lightning
RulesElement.specific: Your lightning attacks ignore lightning resistance and treat lightning immunity as lightning resistance equal to one-half target's level.

Weapon.name: Challenge-Seeking Dagger +3
Weapon.HitComponents: -1 Strength modifier. +5 half your level. +3 proficiency bonus. +3 enhancement bonus. +1 Feat bonus - Versatile Expertise (Light Blade)
Weapon.DamageComponents: -1 Strength modifier. +3 enhancement bonus. +1 bonus - Two-Weapon Fighting +2d6+2d6 bonus to all damage.
Weapon.Conditions: +3 to attack rolls against a creature you are flanking instead of the normal +2 bonus, and you grant a +3 bonus to attack rolls or skill checks when aiding another instead of the normal +2 bonus - Flock Effect. +2 to damage rolls against bloodied targets - Gauntlets of Blood (heroic tier).

Weapon.HitComponents: -1 Strength modifier. +5 half your level.
Weapon.DamageComponents: -1 Strength modifier.
